description: Separatist Quim Torra will be forced to step down after he was found guilty of disobeying a court.
title: Quim Torra: Spain's top court bans Catalonia leader from office
title_page: Quim Torra: Spain's top court bans Catalonia leader from office - BBC News
maintext: Its drive for independence plunged Spain into its biggest political crisis in 40 years in 2017. The region had its autonomy suspended for almost seven months by Madrid after a failed bid to break away.
